glsa.title: DokuWiki: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities were found in DokuWiki, the worst of which leading to privilege escalation.

background.p: DokuWiki is a simple to use Wiki aimed at a small companyâ€™s documentation needs.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in DokuWiki. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: The vulnerabilities might allow an attacker to disclose local files, to inject arbitrary web script, or to gain elevated privileges in the DokuWiki application.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
